__List of slots__

"slotId": "SPbnc451"

 "possible_Values":

 "slotname": "Xpresspost International"
 "possible_Values"
• Provides accelerated delivery to certain countries.
• Minimum weight is 5 kg .Maximum weight is 30 kg (USA) and 20 to 30 kg (depending on the international destination).
• Handed off to the USPS / other postal administrations as Priority Mail Express / EMS.

**Instructions:**
Go through the text below.
 I ask you to extract  from this text all relevant slots and their possible values that present in the list that you were provided. Each slot has its Id, name and possible_values, which means the slot must match one of the provided value.  Slot Id consists of 2 uppercase letters, 3 lowercase letters, 3 numbers".  If multiple slots are provided, fill all the slots.  If a slot value is not provided, set the value of the slot to "none".
Return your answer in json.  Include in your response slotId and slot possible values.

### text:

I want to share my satisfaction of the services I experienced recently with CanadaPost. My small parcel (1,2 kg) was delivered accurately to the birthday date of my beloved brother Tom. All fragile items enclosed in the parcel sustained no harm. The courier was very polite. I'll definitely use again surface service if I need to send anything locally ( within the country)".
